description:
this beat was made for a PRETTYM!N .. i LOVE this beat so much from the absolute depths of my soul. it's the first romantic song that i wrote in a truly positive light with confidence. there was no guessing with this one. no hiding or wondering if i will ever be enough for this person. he is a very very important being and the music represents that well. i am so excited to record the rest of the vocals and upload the full version for you all to collect. 

I created this in Ableton starting off with the rhodes chords. I then added some clavinet and extra synth lines. From there, i made the 808 bass and drum arrangement with loops and one-shots. i also sung the vocals and performed the nylon guitar. Enjoy the sounds and message me if you pick up some editions, you can get access to future releases and the audio files itself.
